Solaris 5.10 with GCC with GCC ld
Windows XP SP3 with Visual Studio C++ 2008 with SFU 3.5

i: 1) - Unless specified otherwise GCC is used for compilation.
2) - Compilation gets 100% score only when both library and all unit test can be build. On the other hand, compilation gets 0% score if non of the library components could be linked.
3) - Only two scores are possible here 100% and 0%.

ul.li: Platform - description of platform where tests were performed.
Compilation - amount of code that actually compiles.
Best case - amount of unit and regression tests that actually passed in best case very gentle run.
Ultimate - amount of unit and regression test that actually passed during heavy burden run.
